item.title: How to Model a 3D Character Bear Maya Tutorial
How to Change the Cursor size of Move Tool in Maya
item.description: Sometimes working in Autodesk Maya the Move tool cursor is super huge. Why does this happen? How can you make the move tool cursor smaller on the screen so you can grab the handles and move your 3D model? This tutorial shows you how. üëç Support on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/WhatMakeArt üü• Subscribe https://www.youtube.com/

item.title: 3D Model a Penguin in Form Workspace in Fusion 360
Ball Bounce Animation in Maya Tutorial
How to Insert a Reference Image into Maya
item.description: When 3D modeling in Maya it is convenient and helpful to have a reference image in your scene to make sure your 3D model proportions are correct. How do you insert a reference image in Maya? This Maya video tutorial shows you how to use a Free Image Plane to insert a reference image for 3D modeling in Maya.
